actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize Federal financial assistance if a site in the United States is selected for the 1984 Olympic summer games.

summary.text: Olympic Summer Games Authorization Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Commerce to provide financial assistance to State, local, or other governmental agencies for purposes of assisting in the planning, design, and construction or improvement of facilities for the 1984 Summer Olympic Games. Authorizes the Secretary to provide financial assistance for projects related to the Summer Olympic games under the authority contained in title I of the Public Works Development Act of 1965.

titles.title: A bill to authorize Federal financial assistance if a site in the United States is selected for the 1984 Olympic summer games.
